overview: Landing page for Digital Experience Healthcare featuring navigation, hero, introduction, and call-to-action sections. Focused on accessibility, branding, and user engagement.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and menu
Hero section with title, subtitle, and image
Introduction section with three informational cards
Call-to-action section with heading and buttons
interactions: Click skip-to-content link to jump to main content
Navigate via navbar links (Home, More Information, Contact Us)
Toggle dark/light mode using theme-toggle button
Click CTA buttons to explore services or schedule appointments
data_flow: Static HTML content rendered from index.html
Theme toggle updates UI state (aria-pressed attribute)
Navigation links route to other static pages
CTA buttons likely trigger navigation or form interactions
accessibility: ARIA labels for navigation and buttons
Alt attribute on hero image (empty for decorative)
analytics: Potential page view tracking on route changes
CTA button click events for conversion tracking
Navbar link click events for navigation analytics
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link focuses main content
Check theme-toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
Ensure hero section renders with correct text and image
Confirm introduction cards display correct titles and descriptions
Test CTA buttons are visible and clickable
Run accessibility audit for ARIA and heading structure
Validate favicon and meta tags load correctly
